1650410.name: Outlaw Squadron
1650410.description:
Outlaw Squadron is a turn-based air combat game where speed and squadron tactics are the key to victory. Train your pilots, upgrade airplanes and build a legendary squadron to defeat your enemies. And remember: Never Leave Your Wingman!

Turn-Based Combat:

  • Engage in thrilling dogfights where speed, maneuvers, and skills are crucial.

  • Utilize unique team tactics to multiply your damage and protect your airplanes.

Unique Gameplay:

  • "I Feel the Need... The Need for Speed!": Intuitive 'speed as a resource' mechanic. Faster flying enables skills, creating dynamic choices.

  • "Never Leave Your Wingman!": Formation flying unlocks unique tactical abilities, defensive bonuses and combined attacks.

Autobattler Duels:

  • Observe how your skills perform in auto battler duels and refine your strategies.

Pilots:

  • Create the perfect Squadron Leader or Wingman and become a Legendary Ace.

Airplanes:

  • Fly legendary airplanes like Spitfire, Messerschmitt Bf 109, P-51 Mustang, I-16, Mitsubishi A6M Zero, Me 262 and many more.
